paper_title.en: On nonstandard representations of generalized sections of vector bundles

publication_name.en: Kyoto Daigaku Suurikaiseki-kenkyusyo Kokyuroku, Rikigakukei to Bibunkikagaku (Dynamical systems and differential geometry), (Research Institute for Mathematical Sciences)

paper_title.en: Nonstandard solvability for linear operators between sections of vector bundles

description.en: Given a certain kind of linear operator A (possibly a differential operator or a properly supported pseudodifferential operator) between sections of Hermitian vector bundles over a Riemannian manifold, a necessary and sufficient condition is obtained for the operator A to be solvable in a class of nonstandard sections in a generalized sense of weak solutions. The existence of a fundamental-solution-like internal section is established in the solvable case.
